name: A copper helmet dripping with green ooze
data: It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It increases the users hitpoints poorly.
It increases the users spellpoints adequately.
It has low armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It seems to be missing its visor.
